fields.summary: CLI: Error should not be output when android executable cannot be found

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
By typing the command:
{color:#59afe1}appc titanium setup quick{color} to check the environment.
It looks like the titanium can't detect the android.bat file in "tools" directory by giving the result 
{color:#d04437}"android" executable not found; please reinstall android sdk{color}

I have uninstalled and reinstalled everything for countless times. Can someone help me?
fields.summary: "android" executable not found; please reinstall android sdk
fields.environment:
Node.js v6.11.3
Titanium CLI v5.0.14
Titanium SDK v6.1.2.GA
JDK v1.8.0

comments.body: Hey [~chee_wei94] This is a known issue (TIMOB-24891) that you can safely ignore, the Android executable was deprecated by google. I'm going to close this ticket as a dupe.
